title: Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, with the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 9) (Assessment of Means) 
Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2023 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2023. 

Definitions

title: Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, with the
heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2023” means the Social Welfare
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2023” means the Social Welfare 
(Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 4) (Income 
Disregard) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 160 of 2023). 

Assessment of Means

title: Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, with the
heading: 3. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control)
text_raw:
3. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) 

Regulations 2007 are amended- 

(a) 

in article 8(3), (amended by article 2(1)(a) of the Regulations of 
2023) by the insertion of the following sub-article after 
paragraph (dc): 

“(dd) an amount up to a maximum of €7,000.00 per annum 
from payments made by UCD’s Cothrom na Féine 
Scholarship Programme,”, 

(b) 

in article 155, (amended by article 2(1)(b) of the Regulations of 
2023) by the insertion of the following paragraph after 
paragraph (dab) 

“(dac) any amount to a maximum of €7,000.00 per annum from 
payments made by UCD’s Cothrom na Féine Scholarship 
Programme,”, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [533] 3 

and 

(c) 

in article 174 (amended by article 2(1)(c) of the Regulations of 
2023) by the insertion of the following paragraph after 
paragraph (ic): 

“(id) any amount to a maximum of €7,000.00 per annum from 
payments made by UCD’s Cothrom na Féine Scholarship 
Programme,”. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 October, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 October, 2023. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [533]

title: Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, with the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide that a scholarship payment to a maximum of 
€7000.00 per annum paid by UCD’s Cothrom na Féine Scholarship 
Programme to a person will be disregarded in the means test for social 
assistance payments, increases for qualified adults and the Working Family 
Payment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [533] 5
